description: A project's PRJPCBSTRUCTURE file contains references to each of that project's schematic documents ( .SCHDOC files). When a user opens a project document, Designer automatically updates (or if necessary, recreates) that project's PRJPCBSTRUCTURE file.
NOTE: When importing a Designer project into another CAD application, such as Cadence OrCAD, you often must possess both the project's PRJPCB and PRJPCBSTRUCTURE file.
